content:
The benefits comes from the Public Vault

House host = 400 LOCAL-eM$ (start)
Health = 400 eM$/LOCAL-eM$ (start)
No-jobs security = 900 eM$/LOCAL-eM$
Ex-burglar = 900 LOCAL-eM$ for 6 months. 1,800 eM$ for 1 year if user finds other honest jobs
Internet support = 400 LOCAL-eM$
Media support = 200,000 LOCAL-eM$ if movie, 2,000 LOCAL-eM$ for starter videos, 1,000 LOCAL-eM$ for audio
Ex-beggar = 2,000 LOCAL-eM$ for 6 months. 4,000 eM$ for 1 year if user finds other honest jobs
Family support = 900 eM$/LOCAL-eM$ per children
No-dad support = 1,200 LOCAL-eM$ per children
Gay (surgeries) = 20,000 eM$/LOCAL-eM$
HIV = 15,000 eM$/LOCAL-eM$
Invalids = 1,000 eM$/LOCAL-eM$

 year contribution = 700 eM$/LOCAL-eM$
 year contribution = 1,400 eM$/LOCAL-eM$
20 year contribution = 2,800 eM$/LOCAL-eM$
40 year contribution =  5,600 eM$/LOCAL-eM$


Can request loan, and the MINE-eM$/HARD-eM$ will go to the Gitcratic Open Fund.

Can request loan for BitUniverse, and the V-eM$ will go to the BitUniverse Public Vault.

Can request loan for financing own house or construction, and the eM$/LOCAL-eM$ will go to the GLOBAL Public Vault or LOCAL Public Vault.
title: Benefits
